channel.title: Drop Add-on For bones (a few others)
channel.description:
I have a drop list for around 400 monsters that makes them drop bones. Since theres so much leaching here and i spent a few good hours going through over a thousand (i stopped at around monster 1200 on the monster id-list) plz post a thanks! it will make me feel good :D :D :D
[center]------------------Current Version 1.0------------------- -over 400 monsters[/center]
hope this helps people out a bit.
you can add on and share it but dont be a cunt and not give credit. im trusting you to do so.

item.title: Drop Add-on For bones (a few others)
item.dc:creator: @Flat_Line Flat Line
item.description:
@Flat_Line wrote:

go to HYBRIDSCAPE then find the file NPCDROPS.CFG and add it to the bottom of the list (the bettom before it says “this is the end of drops”)
